data.name: WorkloadIdArgumentName
data.value: WORKLOAD_ID

data.name: WorkloadIdArgumentDescription
data.value: The NuGet package ID of the workload to install.

data.name: VersionOptionName
data.value: VERSION

data.name: VersionOptionDescription
data.value: The version of the SDK.

data.name: SourceOptionName
data.value: SOURCE

data.name: SourceOptionDescription
data.value: The NuGet package source to use during the restore. To specify multiple sources, repeat the option.

data.name: CommandDescription
data.value: Install one or more workloads.

data.name: ConfigFileOptionName
data.value: FILE

data.name: ConfigFileOptionDescription
data.value: The NuGet configuration file to use.

data.name: FrameworkOptionDescription
data.value: The target framework to install the workload for.

data.name: SkipManifestUpdateOptionDescription
data.value: Skip updating the workload manifests.

data.name: NuGetConfigurationFileDoesNotExist
data.value: NuGet configuration file '{0}' doesn't exist.

data.name: InstallationSucceeded
data.value: Successfully installed workload(s) {0}.

data.name: InstallFullCommandNameLocalized
data.value: .NET install command

data.name: InvalidWorkloadConfiguration
data.value: The settings file in the workload's NuGet package is invalid: {0}

data.name: WorkloadInstallationFailed
data.value: Workload installation failed: {0}

data.name: WorkloadCacheDownloadFailed
data.value: Download of workload packs to offline cache failed: {0}

data.name: WorkloadAlreadyInstalled
data.value: Workload(s) '{0}' are already installed.

data.name: InvalidNuGetVersionRange
data.value: Specified version '{0}' isn't a valid NuGet version range.

data.name: WorkloadPathOptionName
data.value: PATH

data.name: WorkloadPathOptionDescription
data.value: The directory where the workload will be installed. The directory will be created if it doesn't exist.

data.name: PrintDownloadLinkOnlyDescription
data.value: Only print the list of links to download without downloading.

data.name: DownloadToCacheOptionDescription
data.value: Download packages needed to install a workload to a folder that can be used for offline installation.

data.name: FromCacheOptionDescription
data.value: Complete the operation from cache (offline).

data.name: TempDirOptionDescription
data.value: Specify a temporary directory for this command to download and extract NuGet packages (must be secure).

data.name: UnrecognizedPackError
data.value: Pack ID {0} unrecognized.

data.name: InstallingPackVersionMessage
data.value: Installing pack {0} version {1}...

data.name: DownloadingPackToCacheMessage
data.value: Downloading pack {0} version {1} to offline cache {2}…

data.name: WorkloadPackAlreadyInstalledMessage
data.value: Pack {0} version {1} is already installed.

data.name: WritingPackInstallRecordMessage
data.value: Writing workload pack installation record for {0} version {1}...

data.name: WritingWorkloadInstallRecordMessage
data.value: Writing workload installation record for {0}...

data.name: GarbageCollectingSdkFeatureBandsMessage
data.value: Garbage collecting for SDK feature band(s) {0}...

data.name: RollBackFailedMessage
data.value: Installation rollback failed: {0}

data.name: RollingBackInstall
data.value: Workload installation failed. Rolling back installed packs...

data.name: RollingBackPackInstall
data.value: Rolling back pack {0} installation...

data.name: CacheMissingPackage
data.value: Package {0} version {1} doesn't exist in offline cache {2}.

data.name: UsingCacheForPackInstall
data.value: Installing package {0} version {1} from offline cache {2}.

data.name: AdManifestUpdated
data.value: Updated advertising manifest {0}.

data.name: FailedAdManifestUpdate
data.value: Failed to update the advertising manifest {0}: {1}.

data.name: AdManifestPackageDoesNotExist
data.value: Advertising manifest not updated. Manifest package for {0} doesn't exist.

data.name: ManifestDoesNotExist
data.value: No manifest with ID {0} exists.

data.name: FailedToInstallWorkloadManifest
data.value: Failed to install manifest {0} version {1}: {2}.

data.name: InstallingWorkloadManifest
data.value: Installing workload manifest {0} version {1}…

data.name: IncludePreviewOptionDescription
data.value: Allow prerelease workload manifests.

data.name: ResolvingPackageUrls
data.value: Resolving package URLs for workload(s) {0}...

data.name: FailedToDownloadPackageManifest
data.value: Failed to download manifest package {0}.

data.name: FailedToGetPackageManifestUrl
data.value: Failed to resolve manifest package URL {0}.

data.name: OSDoesNotSupportMsi
data.value: MSI installations are only supported on Windows.

data.name: DeletingWorkloadPack
data.value: Uninstalling workload pack {0} version {1}…

data.name: SkippingManifestUpdate
data.value: Manifest packages were not found. Skipping manifest update...

data.name: NoManifestsExistForFeatureBand
data.value: No manifests exist for SDK version {0}.

data.name: IncompatibleManifests
data.value: The current SDK isn't compatible with workload manifests of SDK version {0}.

data.name: InadequatePermissions
data.value: Inadequate permissions. Run the command with elevated privileges.

data.name: WorkloadNotSupportedOnPlatform
data.value: Workload ID {0} isn't supported on this platform.

data.name: WorkloadNotRecognized
data.value: Workload ID {0} is not recognized.

data.name: RollbackDefinitionFileDoesNotExist
data.value: Provided rollback definition file {0} doesn't exist.

data.name: RollbackDefinitionContainsExtraneousManifestIds
data.value: Invalid rollback definition. The manifest IDs in rollback definition {0} do not match installed manifest IDs {1}.

data.name: InsufficientPrivilegeToStartServer
data.value: Insufficient privilege to start the server.

data.name: NoTrustWithParentPID
data.value: Failed to establish a trust relationship with parent process ({0}).

data.name: WorkloadUpdatesAvailable
data.value: Workload updates are available. Run `dotnet workload list` for more information.

data.name: PendingReboot
data.value: The machine has a pending reboot. Installation will continue, but you may need to restart.

data.value: Unknown installation type: {0}.

data.value: Warning: Workload garbage collection failed with error: {0}.

data.value: DIRECTORY

data.name: DownloadToCacheOptionArgumentName
data.value: DIRECTORY

data.name: CannotCombineSkipManifestAndRollback
data.value: Cannot use the {0} and {1} options together. If installing from a rollback file, remove {0}. Otherwise, remove {1}

data.name: SkipSignCheckOptionDescription
data.value: Skip signature verification of workload packages and installers.

data.name: CheckForUpdatedWorkloadManifests
data.value: Checking for updated workload manifests.

data.value: Error parsing version '{1}' for workload manifest ID '{0}'
